backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining portfolio data types, admin auth/session logic, storage mixins, and CRUD-ready state maps for skills, projects, experiences, social links, messages, and admin files.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping new Create page, navigation updates, SEO additions, and sitemap changes to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing routing, hooks, components, admin features, and page behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying base background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template including portfolio metadata, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and script mount point.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers, blocking admin routes, and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing public routes including the new /create page for SEO crawling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all public and admin routes including the new /create route.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access denied message with a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminEmailL: Email/password admin login form handling credential submission, error normalization, and redirect to intended admin path.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component enabling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/controls/DarkMod: Theme toggle button switching between light and dark modes.
Animated typing/deleting word component with reduced-motion support and dynamic cycling of words.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin dashboard layout managing auth state, intended-path logic, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Public site footer displaying copyright, branding, and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public-facing layout wrapping pages with navbar, footer, and SEO manager.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicNav: Responsive public navbar with navigation links, mobile menu, and dark mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays project details with image, description, technologies, and links to demo and GitHub.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Simple hook exposing admin auth state for route guarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for creating, updating, and deleting admin-managed entities with unified unauthorized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Defines admin data-fetching hooks for contact messages and the current user's profile using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, validation, login, and logout with shared state and React Query integration.
Offers a mutation hook to submit contact messages and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSeed.ts: Automatically initializes seed data if the caller is an admin and triggers cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hooks for managing authentication state via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioQueries.t: Contains data-fetching hooks for public portfolio content such as about info, skills, projects, and media files.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, themes, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page, loading about info and avatar via hooks with fallback UI and styling.
Allows admins to view and update About page content through a form using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAvatarPage: Page for viewing current avatar and uploading a new one with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page listing links to all portfolio management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExperience: CRUD interface for managing work experience entries with dialogs for add/edit and confirmations for delete.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Displays contact messages with options to mark as read or delete, sorted by creation date.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProjectsPa: CRUD UI for managing portfolio projects, including editing details and deleting entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResumePage: Page to view, upload, validate, and download resume files with upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSkillsPage: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting skills using dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialLink: Admin interface to manage social links with form dialogs and CRUD mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and social links, submitting messages via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Displays a hero section, service offerings, and up to three featured projects fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Shows a timeline of professional experiences with loading states and detailed entries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a hero section with animated titles, project/contact links, and resume download handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists all projects with loading skeletons and falls back to an empty state when no data exists.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Groups and displays skills by category with loading skeletons and level badges.
frontend/src/seo/routeSeo.ts: Defines static SEO metadata for public routes and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/seo/SeoHeadManager.tsx: Manages dynamic SEO tags, canonical links, and JSON-LD based on current route, with special handling for admin pages.
frontend/src/seo/structuredData.ts: Generates JSON-LD structured data for website and person schemas, and combines them.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthErrors.ts: Normalizes backend admin auth errors into simple user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/adminRedirect.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears intended admin navigation paths in session storage.
frontend/src/utils/motokoOption.ts: Utility to unwrap Motoko Candid optional values into plain values or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, extended components, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for a dynamic fullâ€‘stack portfolio site with admin management.
